message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I'm looking for $150 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking for a price within my budget. Could we discuss a price closer to $120?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $135.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the effort to find a middle ground. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $120?
I understand you're still interested in the product, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering my budget, would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?
I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $125.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I believe we've reached an optimal point. Would it be possible to finalize the deal at $120?
I've made several concessions, and I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm not willing to go any lower, so I'm making a firm offer of $128. This is my final counteroffer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering my budget, I believe we've reached the most reasonable price. Could we finalize the deal at $120?
